title: 2 Bdr in CENTER OF GREENPOINT! BY OWNER!
posting_body: ['Furnished or unfurnished.', 'Center of Greenpoint!!!!', '-  Best commuting location possible.', 'The apartment is located on a tree-lined street in prime Greenpoint,  (subway, bus, Citi bikes is next to the building), (main street - Manhattan Ave.)', 'just a two  blocks from East River.(location and convenience).', 'Transmitter park nearby.', "No broker's fee.", 'The apartment is new.', ' It is a light and pleasant place in a quiet, safe building.', 'a large bedroom and a smaller room that can be used as an office/extra bedroom.', 'I´m looking for a responsible, quiet individual or a couple.', 'If you’re interested please respond with your name and number and a bit about yourself and how long you want to stay.', 'Please contact me @ 917 533 33O5 by calling or texting.', '- Hardwood floors,', '- Rooms with fireplaces,', '- Ceiling fan in every room,', '- Wardrobe in every room,', '- Intercom in the building,', '- PARKING SPACE FOR YOUR BIKE!!!', 'No month to month, and no pets.', 'Here are a few questions for you:', 'If you want to get an apartment at Greenpoint next to main street?', 'Would you like to get to work by subway, bus, water taxi.', 'I have all few steps away G and L , and 7, bus or bike or ferry.', 'The G train makes connections to the E, R, N, W in Queens Plaza) or " G " to "L" Train into Union Square Trains which lead to Manhattan.', 'Buses B61 (which will take you straight to Williamsburg)', 'Q24, B43, B48, B61 all on the corner which you can take in lieu of train, 15 - 20 minute into Midtown .', 'It is about 12 blocks to the Bedford Av "L", stop Williamsburg.', 'Some commuters walk over the Pulaski Bridge to the Vernon-Jackson station in Queens to catch the 7 train to Grand Central Station, 42 str, it is a 10-minute trip.', 'Have you dream of living in the heart of Greenpoint culture like most of young people?', 'Do you want to walk out your door and be smack in the middle of tons of great restaurants & bars?', 'Are you tired of overpaying apartment in Manhattan, and high food prices?', 'Do you want a apartment that you can live in for a while?', 'If you answered YES to any of the above then you will LOVE this apartment in THE HEART OF GREENPOINT!', 'This apt is just steps from subway, citi bikes, and block away of East River Ferry.', 'From this location you can be in the city in just 15 minutes.', 'If you want the BEST LOCATION at a right price.']
